what_you_do: Founder of Trient Press, a traditional publishing house that also plans to offer print on demand and self-publishing resources.
who_you_serve: Authors, particularly indie authors looking for traditional publishing or self-publishing support.
social_proof: Featured in Billion Success interview; previously founded Ruscsak Films and Publishing in 2019.
business_focus: Helping authors reach their publishing goals through traditional publishing and upcoming self-publishing resources.
service_provided: Traditional publishing, editing advocacy, upcoming print on demand, upcoming self-publishing resources
